column6: "HEROES AND VILLAINS" PART 3 (OF 4) The Xavier Institute is under attack by The New Brotherhood of Mutants! With the X-Men down for the count, the only ally the students have to help keep these villains at bay is a blind Gambit!
column8: | writer:Chuck Austen | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Udon Comics | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | inker:Danny K. Miki | letterer:Rus Wooton
